Davíd Garza Pérez | 2007-08 , 2008-09 | 5 ( 10 ) | 5

wiki_section_title: Drivers

wiki_section_text: Mexico leads A1 Team New Zealand at the inaugural A1GP

intro: A1 Team Mexico is the Mexican team of A1 Grand Prix, an international racing series.
